content: Hi, I'm having some issues with my account. I've been trying to reset my password but it keeps failing. Can you help me?
Sorry to hear that! Can you please confirm your email address associated with the account so we can try to resolve the issue?
My email is john.doe@example.com. I've also been trying to update my phone number but it's not being recognized.
Thank you for providing that information! Can you please provide me with the last 4 digits of your social security number so we can verify your identity?
As discussed earlier, I've already sent you my SSN. You should have received a confirmation email from us.
